bio.info: A small child who usually tries to act pretty seriously to seem all high and mighty, but when she comes into contact with something she loves, that seriousness deteriorates pretty quickly. She loves to play around with those she trusts, however

physquote: Here comes the chuu-chuu train! Hope you like %SKILL%s!
strongquote: We won't go down without a fight!
Your first mistake was encountering us, your second was standing in our way!
missquote: Maybe I'm the one who needs glasses.
weakquote: It isn't my day, is it?
resistquote: OW OW OW OW OW- Wait, wrong line.
dodgequote: I know some of these things don't have eyes, but come on, this is a bit much!
Darn, your skill was just an inch away.
Come on now, use that high perception of yours!
And I'm not even the fastest on the team.
killquote: I guess I was just too strong for you!

Valoria.name: Psychokinetic Webfire
Valoria.desc: Ramia fires webs upward, and with Valoria's help, they rain down on the foe, with each one exploding in a purple explosion as they hit the floor. This debuffs the foe's agility 3 times.

bio.info: A gooey cyan blob with a nuclear core, hailing from space. They communicate in splishy noises, frequent splishing indicates excitement.

members.name: Valoria

bio.info: Valoria is a quiet, innocent Tanuki. She does not speak much amongst those she's not very familiar with. Many things are foreign to her due to the fact that she is not from Yaretza. She prefers peace over violence, and due to her timidness, may not fight back if provoked alone. Incapable of making choices alone.
bio.backstory:
Valoria is a tanuki from space, hailing from a once extravagant planet called Cosmaria. She was part of the royal family, as her mother was a sister of the king's daughter. She lived with her parents, and brother. 

However, cruel figures that I'm too lazy to describe right now arrived to invade. Most of the royal family was killed, and that includes her parents. 3 others escaped, herself, her brother and the king's daughter.

The three were separated, both having escaped in separate ''Capsules''. Her capsule crash-landed on the <#833106074659454986> of Yaretza, and was discovered by the group.
bio.theme: [Pull the Trigger - Persona Q2: New Cinema Labyrinth](https://youtu.be/n5O_jq1CSv0)
bio.fears:
Being stranded, Near death situations

<Advantages> Usually very kind, F l o  a t, Knowledge about the ‚ú® stars ‚ú® 

<Disadvantages> Heat makes her tired, Scares easilly, Not very agile

critquote: ...Maybe I should infuse my attacks with the power of pizza thoughts...

meleequote: Sorry, but I must do this.
physquote: I absolutely must... hey... wait... what is this script?
allyatkquote: We can do more if we do it together, %ALLY%!
strongquote: Maybe this'll stop you from attacking.
weakquote: H-Hey, I h-have friends to protect!
resistquote: How n**ice** of you! {I'm going to hate myself for this...}
I've... never been given a Christmas present before... thank you...
repelquote: Sending this right back at you!
drainquote: I've... never been given a Christmas present before... thank you...
dodgequote: I guess I'll pass on death.
I'm so slow... You're just terrible at aiming...
I was expecting to get hit as I always do... maybe you're blind...?
B-But I didn't move... I'm concerned.
As one of the slowest here... Shame on you.
Your target is a grey Tanuki...
You're targetting my fur, aren't you.
If you want... I can help check your eyesight...
Come on, I stick out like a sore thumb!
I can give you a map with directions to the closest place you can get your eyesight checked... wait...
healquote: We've come too far to lose.
I won't let you get hurt like this.
As long as I'm here, there's no harming us.
imfinequote: Thank you for checking, %ALLY%, but I'm okay.

Sutela.name: Spirits Aligned
Sutela.desc: Valoria and Sutela strike the foe's very soul together, knocking it out of the foe's body and back, which sends them for a dizzying ride! This attack also places down a healing aura that restores 80% of allies' HP who attack them.

RoyalRapier.name: Royal Rapier
RoyalRapier.desc: A shining rapier passed down the Cosmarian royal family. Younger ones who were part of the royal family were to be skilled in rapier usage just in case the worst happened.

curweapon.name: Royal Rapier
curweapon.desc: A shining rapier passed down the Cosmarian royal family. Younger ones who were part of the royal family were to be skilled in rapier usage just in case the worst happened.

members.journal: Defenseless bug that hides under bushes. They warm up to other people very quickly, and never intend to hurt others. They love being held & pet, and nuzzle others to show their trust. During the summers, they bloom & hand out the blueberries produced to friends & trusted allies.
members.name: Grassimp
